dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I followed Ms. Shimizu to the classroom where she told me to wait outside. From what I could see the classroom was nice and clean, but not too high-tech.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I don't care about the facilities though. I need to know if the girls are pretty!

dialogue.name: Shimizu-Sensei
dialogue.dialogueText: “Now the last thing on the agenda for today is the introduction of a new student. Takeshi-Kun, please come in.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I walk into the room trying to show off my best smile for all the pretty ladies.
